titleStmt.title: The dippers plunged in a sea of absurdities, or An ansvver to Doctor Chamberlaine concerning sprinkling the baptized. By Thomas Bakewell.
titleStmt.author: Bakewell, Thomas, b. 1618 or 19.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Dallam, and are to be sold at his shop in Black-Fryers, neer Carter Lane,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Chamberlen, Peter. To my beloved friends and neighbours of the Black-Fryers.
Annotation on Thomason copy E.597[18]: "Aprill 11. 1649"; the 50 in imprint date is crossed out; on copy E.605[4]: "June. 28".
Reproduction of the originals in the British Library.
Appears at reels 92 and 247 (E.597[18]), and at reel 93 (E.605[4]).

place.placeName: his shop in Black-Fryers, neer Carter Lane
